entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dalhousie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
